website_summaries.verdict: The best budget mechanical beam scale with a small footprint for tight spaces at home or in an office.
pros: Lightweight compared to more expensive and bulky mechanical scales
Platform is large enough for most adults
cons: The scale's pointer can be bent during the shipping process if tied up incorrectly

customer_reviews.title: Pound Numbers are too small
customer_reviews.text: Good scale - unfortunately the lettering is so small it's too hard to read. Better keep a magnify glass handy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schields

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: For the price , it should be rated a five star. It is well made and easy to assemble. I gave it a four star because the needle that shows when you are level is made of plastic and thus difficult to get a precise reading down to the quarter pound. Otherwise it works very well and easy to keep in balance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Apparent aluminum rivets are not strong enough to supprt tension applied by nut.
customer_reviews.text: Reason for low rating: 86 year old person was attaching the black scale platform to the scale assembly and one of the attachment bolts/nut separated from the scale assembly. Reason: Bolt was attached to the scale assembly by a an apparent aluminum, rivet (s) that separated. Otherwise, the scale (not assembled) appeared to meet the advertised description.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly. Very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: This scale works remarkably well. I don't understand why other reviewers complained about it being difficult to assemble. Just lay it down, stick the base on the end, and tighten a few nuts. What more could you want? It's also incredibly accurate. If I weigh myself, drink a cup of water, and weigh myself again, I have to slide the weights a little farther to the right. I also use this to weigh my suitcases when I travel. I can't do that with a regular bathroom scale because my suitcase covers up the display. When I get to the airport, sure enough the airline scale shows the same weight that I measured at home. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Dwyer III

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The scale broke in about two weeks the top portion became disconnected!!!. I contacted healthometer and the replaced it with a new one. Great customer service!! Hope the new one doesn't do the same thing
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve M. Krebs

customer_reviews.title: Don't "Weight" to Buy this Scale
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best scale I have ever purchased. It is completely accurate. Never again will you immediately step on and off to find different weights. It was worth every cent. Due to its size, it is somewhat difficult to "hide" in the event you have guests. But, I have seen many friends get on to try it out anyway. It was relatively simple to put together, but it is a little heavy for those who do not have the luxury of someone strong to help you move it. Once it is assembled, the manual tells you how to adjust it at zero (with a screwdriver or butter knife), and that is it.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, only one flaw
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the overall price. I came with minimal assembly required. Only flaw is the balance beam arm is not metal like most of the scale; it's plastic which I feel slightly diminishes it's accuracy. I had one similar several years ago with all metal parts and it's was dead on accurate. Overall not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Scale ever
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a scale that is accurate. I opted to get the scale with the height bar and the kids like to use that feature too. I will never have to buy another scale again. I wish I had purchased this scale years ago because I have wasted a lot of money in the past on scales which ended up not being accurate. This is the last scale I will ever need. I highly recomment this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: High quality tool!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this instead of yet another typical bathroom scale. Let's see the kids pull the sticker off of this! This is a NICE piece of gear, assembled by my son, and accurate out of the box. I can see the difference before/after a glass of water. It's well built, and should last a lifetime. Just like the doctor's scale, so there's no more surprises going into the clinic. No wonder people's blood pressure is higher at the Dr's office. Sudden Instant Weight Gain Syndrome! SIWGS! Buy this, you'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Head

customer_reviews.title: Love a beam scale
customer_reviews.text: Yeah wear a fitness watch and weigh my food these days, needed a reliable source for weight checking. Love a beam scale, no way it can lie to you as you can calibrate it. This one came fully calibrated even after shipping!
customer_reviews.author: CRITT3RMAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice scale
customer_reviews.text: After buying several stand on mechanical and electronic scales, I will never buy another. This balance beam scale has a small footprint similar to other scales, but is very easy to use. Since you can balance it at zero and use the sliding weights, it is easy enough to know if it is out of adjustment. My other scales would always give a different reading every step on, but this is very consistent and you don't have to worry about the accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Colvin

customer_reviews.title: Health o Meter Physsician Balance Beam Scale
customer_reviews.text: After returning the Seca 700 at least this one works. The unit went together really easy and was pretty much balanced. When I set it in the bathroom and aligned the base to the tiles the head is crooked enough where it bugs me. It looks like when the balance beam head was tack-welded to the pillar support they didn't do a very good job. But I'm coming to the conclusion you just can't buy anything anymore that is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Westfall

customer_reviews.title: The wife is into fitness and wanted an accurate scale ...
customer_reviews.text: The wife is into fitness and wanted an accurate scale for our bathroom so I got her this and we threw away the 2 innacurate electric scales we had. At least this isn't off 1-3 pounds up or down when you step on it a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Photogragher

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GERAT
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying the step on scales, spring loaded and electronic, etc. They simply stop working and are inconsistent. We decided to get a balance beam model like our doctor uses. This was a good value (Cheaper than other sites) PLUS it had free shipping. We set it up and it works great. You just need to have room for it. It is very consistent and the weight matches what the doctors scale reads (less than +/- 1/2 lb difference).
customer_reviews.author: DabuckTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Love This Scale!
customer_reviews.text: It seemed sort of crazy to purchase a physician's scale, but having used it I would say you are crazy to not have a physician's scale! The scale was easy to assemble. I did it myself in about 15 minutes, including unpacking it. The weight is accurate and the kids think it is fun to use the height measuring tool. I had a standard Health O Meter scale previously and was pleased with it (until I accidentally dropped it and it broke) which is why I looked for an upgrade of the same brand. Well worth the little bit of extra money over a standard scale and this one should last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Joelle A. Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service by seller Center Aisle LLC very poor
customer_reviews.text: The Health o Meter itself was low quality for the money. The assembly instructions indicate that the contents include 2 counterweights for heavier weight items but they were not received. The packaging styrofoam actually had holes where the weights would have been placed, but according to Center Aisle LLC the company decided a few months ago not to include them any longer. They did not have any care or concern that the packaging stated the counterweights were included nor did they seem to care whether or not I returned the item. Won't purchase anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: hac4

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction!
customer_reviews.text: After years of using junk digital weight scales, I decided to purchase an old-fashioned doctor's scale. This one works great! Assembling it was easy. This scale has helped me keep track of my weight, as I'm trying to shed half of my weight. So far, I've lost 23 lbs.! I figure if I shed 5 lbs. a week, I'll be gone by Christmas. :)
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: No more guessing!
customer_reviews.text: After years of using a dial type scale, I got tired of squinting to read results and needing to constantly adjust the zero point. I wanted something consistently accurate. This scale is well-made, easy to calibrate, and easy to read. It does not have the wild fluctations associated with the usual household scale. The price is attractive and easily what I have spent on unsatisfactory "bathroom" scales! Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Sam W

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, fairly easy to assemble, even by myself, One little bothersome detail: the pointer is skewed towards and almost touches the front of the metal aperture. This doesn't affect accuracy, and could probably be corrected by me if I turned the thing upside down and fiddled with the insides, but it doesn't bother me enough to do that. Glad I got it because my former bathroom scale weighs me almost a pound heavier, and I need all the encouragement I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Hosken

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this scale and when it came it had parts broken and could not be used. I returned it and tried a second one. This one came with only two straps holding the box closed. The box had previously been opened. When we put it together and tried to adjust the screw to balance it to zero, it would not worked. We could not get the balance beam to work at all. Since this was the second one we tried, we asked for a refund. Amazon was very prompt in giving us the refund, so I will definitely buy from them again, just not another scale.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Stop wasting time
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely reliable scale just like the kind in the doctor's office. It is easily assembled & set up. The results are consistent & the scale is sensitive to 1/4 of a pound. Stop getting on and off those digital and analog scales to get a reliable reading - this one is worth every penny. I should have gotten it years ago. Update: 6/13/2008: I am still happily using this scale without any problems at all. It is still a good match for the doctor's scale & also for my veterinarian's scale when we weigh our dog. This has helped me lose 65 lbs and keep it off.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Product was off by 50lbs when we put it together. That was after be calibrated it. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Planavsky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed this for this office.. Heavy duty and great for the number of consumers we serve.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Very good, consistent
customer_reviews.text: Very good, consistent, sturdy. It's not as heavy duty as the ones in a doctor's office, but that wasn't really my expectation for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Levy

customer_reviews.title: Linda B.
customer_reviews.text: I received this scale a few weeks ago and I love it. I find it to be very accurate as I have been able to weigh at the doctors office and come immediately home and weigh on my new scale to compare. It is simple to assemble, easy to determine your weight and read the numbers. I would recomend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LINDAB

customer_reviews.title: Most Accurate Scale I Have Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Most scales (especially digital ones) I've used in the past can vastly different readings when used to weight myself within a 10 minute period. This scale gives the same, accurate weight every time that you step on it. Assembly was very simple. 1) Attach the base to the upright stand with four screws at the bottom of the base 2) Attach a cable from the stand to the base 3) Attach the height rod and tighten two screws which are already mounted. In total, it took about 10-15 minutes to un-package and build. Would highly recommend if you are looking for an accurate scale.
customer_reviews.author: rubendn

customer_reviews.title: Weight, weight ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much what I expected, although I believe it weighs a little light. That makes me happy...if deceived
customer_reviews.author: JSB in NWI

customer_reviews.title: Could of been a 5
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered damaged. After unpacking and assembling, the weight arm would jam against the side and not move freely. After noticing some scratches on the weight arm, I took the cover off the pivot support and could see the support was bent by the arm. The product was probably dropped pretty hard to bend the support, it's pretty hefty. It took some work but I was able to straighten the support and reassemble the cover. The scale now works great providing accurate and consistent readings. Based on the low price and how well this product works I would rate the scale a 5. Ordering went smooth and the scale was delivered to my house within 4 days.
customer_reviews.author: Someone Somewhere

customer_reviews.title: I bought it in 2009 and just love it, no more guessing if my reading is ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it in 2009 and just love it, no more guessing if my reading is accurate. My whole family loves it too, always use it when they come to visit. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andromeda

customer_reviews.title: This is a great scale. It takes up almost no room because ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great scale. It takes up almost no room because it's vertical. And gives the most true weight readings every should have gotten this before the floor scales.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Braxton

customer_reviews.title: Health o Meater 402KL Balance Beam Scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale takes up just about the same amount of space as my old bathroom scale but is so much more accurate. Also, as my eyes are getting older, this scale is easier to read because the markings are right at eye level. It operates exactly the same as my doctor's scale and is very easy to use. Hooking the spring into position when I first set it up was a bit awkward but still only took a few moments. I'm very pleased with the product and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer, Edna Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scale and value
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. This scale has been durable for over a year. It is extremely accurate and repeatable. It is zeroed very easy. Assembly needs a little focus but it is a great product especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: herknav24

customer_reviews.title: Scales Review
customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased with the scales. It is well built and very easy to assemble. Assembly requires only screwon on 4 nuts and attaching 1 wire. A tool is even provided because the nuts are recessed. The scales was a tiny bit off calibration, (it did not perfectly balance on zero when empty), however a very small screwdriver adjustment and it works great. I like the way that I can make a weight measurement and leave the weights alone and then the next day I can easily determine if I have gained or lost weight. I am looking forward to many years of service from this scales. John Moesner
customer_reviews.author: jmoesner

customer_reviews.title: Like in the doctor's office
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Just as expected. No problems whatsoever. I wanted a scale that I can use to measure my weight as accurate as those that are in a doctor's office...and NOW!... I HAVE that!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. DeMure

customer_reviews.title: Easy enough to assemble
customer_reviews.text: C'mon, it's just a doctor's scale. Easy enough to assemble, works fine. There is only one drawback - you have to use a screwdriver to set the zero point. It would be better if there were something you could easily turn by hand.. You set the zero point by turning a threaded rod that moves the counterweight from left to right. A knurled knob or some such arrangement would be lots better.
customer_reviews.author: Maurice J Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Scale
customer_reviews.text: If you are feed up with digital scales and how they don't give you the same reading when take several readings in a row then this is the scale for you. This is the same type of scale most doctors have. It can accurately measure up to 350 lbs and with the included weights can go up to 500lbs. The height measurement bar needs a little getting used to almost looks like it is upside down but you just need to stand on the center of the scale and it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jaldis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together- hard to find a flat enough ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together- hard to find a flat enough spot in the old clinic floor- but overall just what I needed for PQRS Medicare measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Moab.PT

customer_reviews.title: Big Boy needs fulfilled
customer_reviews.text: I am a big man, and have become health concerned in my later years. Keeping an eye on weight has become critical. everyday bathroom scales just don't cut it and digital scales that tell you to come back when your alone are not funny anymore. I needed a scale that was accurate and durable. The Health O Meter scale gave me just that and more. Big men and women now have an avenue to stay in touch with their weight and be able to monitor the direction they are headed. I can now tell the nurse in the doctors office how much I weigh, within a pound, of their readout.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Belza

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back. It took a long time to receive it and it was inaccurate
customer_reviews.author: james mccolloch

customer_reviews.title: Who likes a scale anyway.....
customer_reviews.text: I decided to make this purchase after digital scale after digital scale gave inconsistent readings and quit working after a few months. I wanted a scale that would be accurate everytime and be around for years. This is definitely it. It is big like the doctor's office scales, so won't go in most bathrooms (it is not pretty anyway). I rated it a 4 out of 5 because the mechanism was bound up when we got it and had to figure out why it would not work. I good pull while I was standing on it freed it up. The hole where the scale needle goes through is a little bent, but works ok. Not bad enough to send back.
customer_reviews.author: T. Meier

customer_reviews.title: wonderful scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale is fantastic, we wish we would have purchased this years ago. We received the scale within days of order and it was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Best scale!
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this is the best scale I've bought! Went through numerous digitals which are not worth the money. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this scale
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this scale. I wish the index numbers were much larger or higher contrast. Otherwise it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: droto

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Seems to be accurate and was easy enough to put together.
customer_reviews.author: LinAbby

customer_reviews.title: Scale
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted a scale like this. Works great and doesn't need batteries. Seems to be very accurate as well. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Very happy customer
customer_reviews.text: While some of the negative reviews indicated that there was a quality problem with this product - I went ahead and purchased anyway. I'm very happy - the product is very clean, well designed, and goes together easily. The product arrived in great shape. We use it in an office with dozens of people using it regularly - and we have no problem with the product. It gives repeatable and accurate results over a long period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Popeil

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, the first purchased about 6 years ago. This one is a little lighter quality but after a minor adjustment works just fine. Only problem is it always tells the truth!
customer_reviews.author: P. Lattavo

customer_reviews.title: Love this Scale!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is such a great dealing to know that this scale gives me a consistent weight every time. Nothing affects it. No springs to change slightly. I bought sanity while on my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good balance beam scale
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive scale that seems to do a pretty good job of keeping track of my weight, which I have to do every day for health reasons. I checked it for a while against a floor standing scale and they matched quite well. It is rather large for residential use, but fits in a corner of a bathroom, so not a problem. I'd say a good value for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Hatley

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, exceedingly accurate. Has survived two moves and stays right on the number. Would recommend highly as a very accurate scale.
customer_reviews.author: SCWer

customer_reviews.title: Health O Meter Physician Balance Scale
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice scale, easy to assemble taking only a matter of seconds. Works perfectly. Nice quality balance scale at a reasonable price. If you want a decent balance scale I would Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: r.wade

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: The first scale was received damaged. It was incredibly easy to return and request a replacement. The replacement arrived in great condition and has operated beautifully. Very satisfied with the product and service from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Elihu H. Dodier

customer_reviews.title: Works well but large and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very practical scale if you have the room for it. You can trust it more than an electronic one but it won't fit under the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really cheaply made compared to the USA version it replaced but works
customer_reviews.author: Always Buying Something

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for your personal gym!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, easy to assemble and quick delivery. Works great! Like the fact of having the accuracy of our weight. Perfect for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Your Real Weight Everytime
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat it, it is easy to set up and easy to use. The wheels are over priced and are not needed.
customer_reviews.author: Burton C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to put together for two people. The scale works greats and arrived earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Barker

customer_reviews.title: A Great Scale!
customer_reviews.text: I think it is built very well, especially for the price I paid. I like the accuracy and I no longer lose or gain 3 to 5 pounds a day like I did with my old scale. If you want consistency and you have the room for a scale like this, buy it you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ScottD

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Scale
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that the lettering on the scale is very hard to read because it is too small so I have to remember to get magnifying glasses to see it
customer_reviews.author: Get it Done

customer_reviews.title: Great All Around
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this scale for the office (employees request). It was inexpensive, free delivery, easy set up, and works perfectly. I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: MochaHead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is just as accurate as those in doctor's offices.
customer_reviews.author: Amahra

customer_reviews.title: health o meter scale
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this scale is that it is accurate and gives the same reading no matter how many times you step on it. We went through 3 digital scales and none of them had good repeatability. The scale is easy to put together and reads in both lbs. and kgs. Probably the last scale I will ever buy.
customer_reviews.author: jeffslick

customer_reviews.title: Super service.
customer_reviews.text: A gret product. The same weight every time. Super service from Health o Meter. The first one was broken and I had the replacement with no hassle in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Finally a scale that I believe. With all my ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a scale that I believe. With all my previous scales, I would get a different reading each time I weighed myself, even if the tries were 1 minute apart. Never wanted to spend that much money for a scale, but sometimes you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Diana G. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Health o Meter Balance Beam Scale
customer_reviews.text: When the scale arrived, there was a problem with the blance beam. I call for instructions, and was told the unit needed to be returned. The next day they had it picked up and a replacement on the way. 4 or 5 days later we had the replacement scale. I put it together in about 5 minutes. We have had it about a month. It works great. I weigh too much, but I don't think that is the scales fault :>)
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful scale. I don't always like what it shows but that is my fault.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Carmichel

customer_reviews.title: Weight loss
customer_reviews.text: The scale is accurate and it repeats. The price is good. Spring scales are not accurate nor are cheap digitals. I am happy with the scale. Not happy with my weight. William Blake
customer_reviews.author: Marie from Texas

customer_reviews.title: Very gd
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and works great..I bought it for the gym i train in so every day a lot of people check their weight.
customer_reviews.author: double-r

customer_reviews.title: Weigh To Go!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scale. I weigh in daily, the only thing that I do NOT like about this item is that it does NOT lie! True weight! Not that I could not stand to loose a few pounds. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: My doctor said it is the best investment I could have made in regard to my ...
customer_reviews.text: A little expensive for home use, but worth the money. Very accurate. My doctor said it is the best investment I could have made in regard to my health.
customer_reviews.author: Frank T. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: I was tired of wishy-washy digital scales!
customer_reviews.text: Digital scales (I have two) would give me different readings from scale to scale and even on the same scale. Variation could be as much as 3 to 4 pounds. Balance beam zeros easily and gives true weight first time and every time. Calibrated in 0.25 lb increments which could have been at least in 0.2 lb increments to give a more precise weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works well
customer_reviews.text: went together easy and works well after adjusting. What else can I say? If you want so many words write it your self
customer_reviews.author: Joe Maurino

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the money
customer_reviews.text: It was what I expected, and easier to assemble than I thought. Seems to work well, consistent. Good value, I'd say.
customer_reviews.author: raconter

customer_reviews.title: Extra Loose Pieces - No Help from Manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: The product itself appears to be of good quality. Unfortunately, it arrived with some loose pieces, mostly from the height measuring apparatus. A call to the manufacturer to find out how to put the loose pieces back in their correct places offered no help. They could only send us the non-detailed diagrams that came in the box for assembling the scale. The instructions and diagrams tell you exactly what you need to know, if everything arrives intact. We spent a couple of hours trying to put the pieces in place and ended up securing one piece with a paper clip.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: High quality scale
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a doctors office type scale just like one we had purchased previously. The scale works great and is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: P Bloesser

customer_reviews.title: Great Scales!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Fire and Rescue Department for every station. All work fine with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T.B.

customer_reviews.title: Consistancy at last
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of scales that gave a different reading every time I stepped on them. I have bought several of the regular floor scales - all with the same problem, inconsistant readings. I love these, i can step off and back on and my weight will be exactly the same. I also got very fast delivery with amazon prime.
customer_reviews.author: truebluedave

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: Extremely (and at times, painfully) accurate! Now my whole family comes to weigh themselves at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Irma A

customer_reviews.title: The scale apparently needs to be calibrated which I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The scale apparently needs to be calibrated which I didn't realize was going to be needed when I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good scale at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: The is a good basic balance beam scale. It was much easier to assemble that I feared and works as expected. It arrived in good condition and on time and it works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley J. Alluisi

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: The Health o Meter looked good but when one gets on the scale, it wobbles and is unsteady. Would not have purchased it had I known it would be so flimsy. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: karen stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Health O Meter 402L
customer_reviews.text: This scale arrived quickly and is great. I have it in my kitchen and it takes up little room. Everyone is glad to see it! It measures accurately and easily. So glad I received it as a birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma of Dragon lover

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: We wiegh ourselves every day. When anyone walks past this they can not help but see thier wieght. This is such a sturdy machine that I know it will be passed down to our gradnchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Scale
customer_reviews.text: Excellent weighing scale. Very precise. We use it everyday as a tool to help us monitor and lose weight and are being succesfull in that endeaver. The height part is not precise at all due to the flexability of the height bar. It is plastic and gives to much to be consistantly accurate. I would recommend the scale part to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The scale is a standard doctor's office model. It works perfectly, was easy to put together, and is very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: JHW

customer_reviews.title: Real doctor's scale
customer_reviews.text: This scale is the same as those found in many doctor offices. It is easy to use, dependable, and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: bad design of numeric scale and tick marks
customer_reviews.text: The numbers do not line up with the tick marks. Thus if your scale slider sits as 145, you really weigh 145.25.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Wegelin

customer_reviews.title: Health o meter Physician Balance Beam scale
customer_reviews.text: The scale was all that I expected. It is the scale that I learned to use in my training. It is much easier to use than a floor scale. I trust the balance feature much more than the other scale's mechanism. It was not at all hard to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Quinton

customer_reviews.title: nice and good machine
customer_reviews.text: I got the machine on time and unlike some of the reviews, I didn't have any nicks or scratches on my item. The only reason for the 4 rating is I had to re calibrate the scale quite a few times as it kept becoming uneven and didn't start out at 0.
customer_reviews.author: shimon g.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I did not expect it to be so big. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: DWFRL

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied client
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product that is used mainly by health care professional. The scale is reliable, practical and easy to use, providing consistent results in comparison with electronic scales. It easily converts from pounds to kilograms. The price was right and the delivery service was outstandingly fast.
customer_reviews.author: A. Aziz

customer_reviews.title: Healthometer bathroom scale
customer_reviews.text: The scale met all my expectations, was easy to assemble, simple to use and has a small footprint of space in our bathroom. We have found accurate and dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: health o meter physician balance beam scale
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the scale, works good will last our life time, nothing was damaged in shipping, would highly recommend this scale.
customer_reviews.author: Liz S

customer_reviews.title: Just like the Doctor's office.
customer_reviews.text: The scale arrived in perfect condition. Assembly took about 5 minutes with no problems at all. We are finally able to know what we weigh without worrying about whether the batteries are low or we are standing in the same place. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jack T. Hosea

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: this gives you a perfect read I wish that we bought this years ago and did not have to rely on the floor models
customer_reviews.author: Ed Goettl

customer_reviews.title: it met with wife's approval
customer_reviews.text: the scale arrived in perfect condition and as promised for delivery time; The price and free delivery make it an excellent value for anyone looking for an accurite weighing scale , you can step on and off as many times as you want and the results are the still the same.
customer_reviews.author: rich in vermont

customer_reviews.title: Finally a scale that tells it like it is!
customer_reviews.text: For years, my home scales have not been always honest with me, in fact, rarely so. They have always, or so it seems, claim that I a weigh less then my phsycians' scales reveal. Well, this product finally tells it like it is. Get serious about losing weight!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Swygert

customer_reviews.title: very happy with scale
customer_reviews.text: As always Amazon delivers speedy service. We received our scale within a couple of days and it was damaged from the warehouse, we called and it was picked up immediately and a perfect replacement sent. This one is perfect and very accurate.
customer_reviews.author: bjcanady

customer_reviews.title: Accurate scale
customer_reviews.text: This is the first scale I have owned that consistently weighs me accurately. This has been important to me because weight management is an important part of my daily routine.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hayek

customer_reviews.title: Scales
customer_reviews.text: I am the fitness manager for a large resort. People seem to like a bigger scale similar to the old time doctor's office. These scales are extremely acccurate and perfect for our locker rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Wiltse

product_meta.title: Healthometer 402KL Physician Beam Scale w/ Height Rod (390 lb / 180 kg)
product_meta.description: Size:390 lb Capacity and Fixed Poise BarThe 402KL/402KLSB Physician Balance Beam Scale with built in height rod features a large heavy duty steel 1/4 lb platform with raised balance beam for increased foot room. With accurate readout and easy weight reading,the weight capacity is 390 with optional counterweight to bump up to 490lb.. The 402KL Physician Balance Beam Scale also features easy to read double beams with slide poises and a 30" 78" measuring rod to help monitor growth. The rugged zinc die cast beam is constructed with copper, nickel, chrome plating with protective rolled edges, rounded corners and filled with durable white baked enamel finish.
feature_bullets: Scale is just like the one you'd find in your doctor's office
Heavy gauge steel base and platform for professional accuracy
Silent slide height rod measures from 30-78 inches
